root.name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2: Time Twister
root.description: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2: Time Twister is the second expansion to be released for RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 and adds new features and time-themed rides for the game. The base RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 game is required to install and play Time Twister.
